modName: Skyrim Heartfire  Crafting Extended Kids Clothes and gift
summary: with this mod you can craft your kids gift easily without any hassle to go find what store that sells kid stuff, please give feedback and comment  thank you ~ have fun :D.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Heartfires  Crafting Extended
- Kids gift

Description
You see long time ago when i get heartfire, it\'s so hard to find gift for kids on skyrim due to harsh condition with dragons and all that  ,  with this simple mod  you can make this pretty much everywhere, you don\'t need that  much to create clothes for your children , it only need at least 1-3 crafting  ingredients.
i always wanted  to give  my kid\'s a simple gift when i get home after tiring quest  it always bring me smile to  see kids happy what i give to them .
Requirement
- skyrim [ main game]
- Skyrim patch 1.9
- Dragonborn [DLC]
- Dawnguard [DLC]
- Heartfires [DLC]

Crafting sections
kids clothes can be crafted at Tanning rack  along with craftable shoes  , complete set for all ages.
Wooden sword called \" Oak Tree Wooden Sword\"  * cough * nord kids will love this one.. lol

Recommended Mods to go along with this one.

* Immersive weapons \"  because it has wooden weapons*

 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644/ 

*Althirs camping set , with this mod  not only it gives you the tent  , it also give you portable
  crafting forge , enchant etc   to craft these gifts for your kids *
 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10824
author: Luthien21
